name: TooltipTheme
info: Mainly used to set default properties for descendant Tooltip components uniformly. You can also retrieve the properties of the default TooltipTheme through this component.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of TooltipTheme
desc: You can specify the TooltipThemeData properties to set default styles for descendant Tooltip components, such as decoration, text style, display duration, margins, etc. You can also use TooltipTheme.of to get the theme properties of Tooltip.
